• Click the arrows to navigate through the sortiment,
    and find your desired product.
  • Every product has the slot number in the left top corner,
    the price in the right corner and a name on the bottom.
  • Click a product to get more information about it.
    You will find more images, a description and a feature list in the information screen.
  • You can close the information screen with the close button.
    Click it to go back to the sortiment.
